modName: Smoking Torches - Torch of Everlasting with Dynamic Shadows - Compatibility Patch
summary: Basically this is a patch that makes Smoking Torches and Torch of Everlasting with Dynamic Shadows working together.
descriptionHtml:
Basically this is a patch that makes Smoking Torches and Torch of Everlasting with Dynamic Shadows working together.

Installation:
[list]
[*]Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35819/?]Smoking Torches v1.31 or v1.4[/url]
[*]Install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4764/?]Torch of Everlasting with Dynamic Shadows v5[/url] or any of the v5 alternatives.
[*]Install this patch and overwrite [b]( When asked to [i]update[/i] Smoking Torches press [u]no[/u] )[/b]
[/list]

I made this patch for myself and I'm releasing it "AS IS".
I might make an update if necessary as long as I'm still playing myself XD.
author: grasmann
